_88ServiceKeywordType.description: Enables specification of Earth science service keywords related to the service.  The Earth Science Service keywords are chosen from a controlled keyword hierarchy maintained in the Keyword Management System (KMS).

$eref.description: This element is used to identify the coverage type, either: point, linestring, bounding box or polygon.

___Type.description: The type of the coverage available from the service.

___Name.description: The name of the coverage available from the service.

___TemporalResolution.description: The temporal resolution of the coverage available from the service.

___SpatialLineStrings.description: The spatial extent of the layer or coverage described by a line string.

___SpatialPolygons.description: The spatial extent of the layer or coverage described by a polygon.

___SpatialBoundingBox.description: The spatial extent of the layer or coverage described by a bounding box.

___SpatialPoints.description: The spatial extent of the layer or coverage described by a point.

___CoverageSpatialExtent.description: The spatial extent of the coverage available from the service. These are coordinate pairs which describe either the point, line string, or polygon representing the spatial extent. The bounding box is described by the west, south, east and north ordinates

___SpatialResolutionUnit.description: The unit of the spatial resolution of the coverage available from the service.

___TemporalResolutionUnit.description: The unit of the temporal resolution of the coverage available from the service.

___RelativePath.description: Path relative to the root universal resource locator for the coverage.

___CoverageTimePoints.description: Points in time representing the temporal extent of the layer or coverage.

___CoverageTemporalExtent.description: The temporal extent of the coverage available from the service.

___SpatialResolution.description: The spatial resolution of the coverage available from the service.

$eref.description: Method for contacting the service contact. A contact can be available via phone, email, Facebook, or Twitter.

___Type.description: This is the method type for contacting the responsible party - phone, email, Facebook, or Twitter.

___Value.description: This is the contact phone number, email address, Facebook address, or Twitter handle associated with the contact method.

___RelatedUrls.description: A URL associated with the contact, e.g., the home page for the service provider which is responsible for the service.

$eref.description: Represents Internet sites that contain information related to the data, as well as related Internet sites such as project home pages, related data archives/servers, metadata extensions, online software packages, web mapping services, and calibration/validation data.

___GetService.description: The service distribution for the relevant web page (e.g., OPeNDAP, OpenSearch, WCS, WFS, WMS).

___URL.description: The URL for the relevant web page (e.g., the URL of the responsible organization's home page, the URL of the collection landing page, the URL of the download site for the collection).

___Description.description: Description of the web page at this URL.

___Type.description: A keyword describing the type of the online resource to this resource. This helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'GET DATA', 'GET SERVICE', 'GET VISUALIZATION').

___Subtype.description: A keyword describing the subtype of the online resource to this resource. This further helps the GUI to know what to do with this resource. (e.g., 'MEDIA', 'BROWSE', 'OPENDAP', 'OPENSEARCH', 'WEB COVERAGE SERVICES', 'WEB FEATURE SERVICES', 'WEB MAPPING SERVICES', 'SSW', 'ESI').

___URLContentType.description: A keyword describing the distinct content type of the online resource to this resource. (e.g., 'DATACENTER URL', 'DATA CONTACT URL', 'DISTRIBUTION URL').

___GetData.description: The data distribution information for the relevant web page (e.g., browse, media).

___ContactInstruction.description: Supplemental instructions on how or when to contact the responsible party.

___City.description: The city portion of the physical address.

___ServiceHours.description: Time period when the contact answers questions or provides services.
